name: Trapped´n Trouble
description: Welcome to Trapped ´n Trouble! You control a boy named Eddie and your Goal is to escape from the cursed A-echi. This game was made in a private Game jam Competition called "There is no end". You use the arrow keys and Space for Movement and X to Attack.                                                                                                                           Note: It only runs on 64 bit windows pc´s                                                                               Note2:Credit to Rosybones for the music                                                                                    Note3: You need to have both the Exe and pck in one folder to run the game
